synopsis.text: The anime "Tokyo Revengers: Seiya Kessen-hen" features an emotional ending theme song titled "It Might Be Painful, but I Still Love It" performed by the artist TUYU. This sentimental ballad explores the bittersweet nature of love and relationships. To complement the moving lyrics, an official music video directed by Kumamiso was created. Capturing the song's poignant essence, the visuals follow a narrative of two lovers as they experience both beautiful and painful moments. Despite hardships, their enduring affection remains. Serving as a fitting conclusion to each anime episode, this touching song and its accompanying video encapsulate the drama and conflicts of love central to "Tokyo Revengers" - ultimately leaving viewers to reflect on bonds that persevere even through adversity. Both meaningful and memorable, this musical piece aims straight for the heart.
